attributes.action: Keep London New Years Fireworks FREE!
attributes.additional_details:
Bois Johnson to start charging £10 per ticket to see the new years fireworks in London.

Limiting the available tickets to 100,000 where as there was 500,000 people bringing in the new year in 2013/14 along the river Thames.

Has he thought about the loss of business he will cause to locals as well as the economy in general.

Please sign and share this petition if you feel that they should stay free for all party go'ers!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London's office not for Government
